================================================================================
proto3
================================================================================

syntax = "proto3";

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

parseTree = [
  {kind: BOF},
    {kind: syntax},
    {kind: =},
    {kind: String},
  {kind: ;, subtreeSize: 4},
  {kind: EOF},
]

================================================================================
expected equal
================================================================================

syntax 'proto3';

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

parseTree = [
  {kind: BOF},
    {kind: syntax},
    {kind: String, hasError: true},
  {kind: ;, subtreeSize: 3},
  {kind: EOF},
]
errs = [expected [=], got String]

================================================================================
expected string
================================================================================

syntax = ;

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

parseTree = [
  {kind: BOF},
    {kind: syntax},
    {kind: =},
    {kind: ;, hasError: true},
  {kind: ;, subtreeSize: 4},
  {kind: EOF},
]
errs = [expected [String], got ;]

================================================================================
expected semicolon
================================================================================

syntax = 'proto3'

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

parseTree = [
  {kind: BOF},
    {kind: syntax},
    {kind: =},
    {kind: String},
  {kind: EOF, hasError: true, subtreeSize: 4},
]
errs = [expected [;], got EOF]
